ul.li: Data mining within the elements TEI ➞ body ➞ div

Attributes values:
Traditionally proposed in XML-TEI: structuralUnit
for structural unit of the preparation to a hermeneutics: Event|perform|who|behav|occasion|where|how

conbody.p:
Structural unit of the interpretation according to taxonomies:
<interpGrp resp="#Juloux" xml:id="hermeneutics" type="structuralUnit" ana="#taxonomies"> <!-- ref --> <interp n="1" xml:id="whatAction" ana="#primaryData #objectiveData #action #verb.category"/> <!-- castList > castItem --> <interp n="2" xml:id="whatCharacter" who" ana="#Character #primaryData #Genetic-sex"/> <interp n="3" xml:id="whatRole" ana="#role #objectiveData"/> <!-- view --> <interp n="4" xml:id="whatContext" ana="#context"/> <interp n="5" xml:id="whatSphere" ana="#objectiveData #sphere"/> <!-- stage --> <interp n="6" xml:id="whatBehavior" ana="#subjectiveData">How acts the animated entity</interp> </interpGrp>
